bike.description: Specialized FACT 7r carbon, triple monocoque construction, Designs for Women compact design, Zertz inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT monocoque carbon fork, full carbon legs, crown and steerer w/ Zertz inserts
Specialized Mindset Plus, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, cartridge sealed bearings, alloy 20mm cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Pave, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
